proof_script:
lemma HSigma_iff [simp]: "\<langle>a,b\<rangle> \<^bold>\<in> HSigma A B \<longleftrightarrow> a \<^bold>\<in> A \<and> b \<^bold>\<in> B(a)"
by (auto simp: HSigma_def)
